column4: hi guys, is there anyone running ubuntu on amilo pi 3540 laptop ?
what is printed on the case means very little, what is your issue?

hi, so my laptop has 4gb of ram so i wanted to install x64 version of ubuntu, but when i insert latest live cd (8.10 x64) and select for example 1st option, to try ubuntu without any changes, notebook reboots
same thing happens when i press the install option
